product_name: Columbia Saturday Trail Stretch Convertible Pants - Women's Short
long_description: Made from durable nylon, the Columbia Saturday Trail Stretch Convertible pants offer comfort and protection during active outdoor adventures. Zip-off legs offer versatility for changing weather. 2-way stretch nylon with a water repellent finish sheds moisture and stains; fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Zip-off legs convert pants to 10 in. inseam shorts. Zip fly with 2-button closure; exposed mesh yoke underneath an oversized rear belt loop facilitates breathability. Hand pockets are lined with breathable mesh and rear pockets have rip-and-stick button closures; includes a zip security pocket inside one front pocket. Columbia Saturday Trail Stretch Convertible pants have an active fit that's not too tight and not too loose, and straight legs.
short_description: Made from durable nylon, the Columbia Saturday Trail Stretch Convertible pants offer comfort and protection during active outdoor adventures. Zip-off legs offer versatility for changing weather.
